admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The loan would finance part of
            BNT's agricultural lending program over 4-1/2 years by
            means of provision of medium- and long-term credit for: (i)
            purchase by small farmers of equipment, seeds, dairy cattle
            and well and irrigation improvements; (ii) purchase by
            commercial farmers of heavier agricultural equipment, pure
            breed dairy stock and concomitant infrastructure, and
            construction and improvement in irrigation infrastructure;
            (iii) date palm plantation development comprising
            groundwater development and irrigation infrastructure, land
            leveling, planting and maintenance of date plans to be
            undertaken by four small farmer's associations; (iv)
            expansion of investment in agro-industries, particularly
            olive oil mills.
